short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmarks Browser allows you to rediscover and browse your saved bookmarks using a combination of randomization and folder displays.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you have tons of bookmarks? So many, you're not even sure what you have saved? Boomarks browser allows you to rediscover your saved bookmarks in a fun and intuitive way. 

Bookmarks are displayed in a familiar social media style that encourages clicking around and exploring your interests. 

You can select a grouping of bookmarks from a variety of folders or select a folder at random. You can click between these views and explore related folders.
